transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Hello. Sir, awaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Good evening IndiaMART se Khushi. Sir good evening IndiaMART se Khushi baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Haan, sun raha hu, bolo na.
Customer: Sir, mujhe aapke jo discussion karni hai, sir aapke paas jo buyers ke calls aa rahe hai na sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, sun raha hu, bolo.
Executive: Sir, jo aapke paas buyers ke call aa rahe hai na, aap wo call utha nahi rahe ho sir, miss kar rahe ho wo call.
Customer: Kya aa rahe hai call?
Executive: Sir, aapke paas five calls aayi hai.
Customer: Aayi bhi call.
Executive: Sir, aapke paas buyers ke call aa rahi hai. Call aap nahi pick kar rahe ho sir.
Customer: Sir, mere paas aati hai to mai attend kyu nahi karunga, aap batao na.
Executive: Aap ek minute, sir, kaunse wale number se aayi hai, haan, kaunse number se aayi hai? Kaunse wale number se aayi hai, batao?
Customer: Mai bata rahi hu aapko.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Sir, yaha pe na aapke char number hai, jisme se do off hai, theek hai? Do on hai, matlab 375 aur 596 is number pe call aa rahi hai sir aapki.
Customer: In number pe call aayi, kaha mere paas aati to mai attend karu na. Pehli baat to yaar mai ub gaya hu in logo se baat kar karke. Mai aapke IndiaMART me jitne bhi log aate hai phone karne wale wo kisi ko bhi apan kuch bheje, uska jawab aur respond sahi nahi aata. Kya? Kyuki ek hi buylead sabhi ke paas aati hai, baat to wahi ho rahi hai na. Bhale unko quotation de de, unse baat bhi kar le sab kuch hai, par baat wahi hoti hai. Otherwise party se bhi baat kar lete hai wo hamare local me.
Executive: Sir, ek minute baat kar rahe hai. Suniye, mai ye keh rahi hu jo aapke paas calls aa rahi hai na, matlab aapke paas jo buylead aa buyer khud call kar rahe hai aapko, wo call aap nahi utha rahe ho, mai ye keh rahi hu aapko.
Customer: Nahi aa raha mere paas ek call. Call miss kar rahe ho aap.
Executive: Miss attend nahi kiya maine. Kya? Sir, yaha pe statistics show ho rahi hai ki aapne kitni calls miss kari hai sir. Theek hai? Mai aapko bata bhi sakti hu ki abhi aapne na bilkul paanch calls miss kari hai. Ek sorry, paanch call aayi hai aapne ek call miss kari hai sir. To aapki bahut jyada miss call, matlab teen call miss kar rahe ho aap October me. To itni jyada na aapko teen score ko attend kare, miss mat karo, theek hai sir?
Theek hai? Aur sir mai aapko ye bata deti hu, ek minute.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Sir, mapping wagera bhi aapki sahi nahi ho rakhi, jaise ki rice distorder ki aapki mapping sahi nahi hai, air rank ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Maine to kuch nahi kiya magar usme.
Executive: To aap mujhe ye bataiye ki
Executive: Sir, ye rice destoner ka jo hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye rice destoner ka jo rahega, uske keywords mujhe aap bata doge?
Customer: Rice distoner kisne likh rakha, maine to likh hi nahi raha, double distoner hai.
Haa? Double distoner hai na, rice distoner kaha hai?
Customer: Double distoner hai.
Customer: Double distoner? Haan, double distoner.
Customer: Distoner ki kitni hai isme? Kitne add kar rakhe distoner?
Executive: Jo rice destoner me karte ho aap?
Customer: Nahi, nahi. Rice distoner nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi deal karte ho? Vacuum me double distoner, vacuum distoner, bas yahi hai.
Executive: To fir waha se delete karwana padega sir aapko mujhe.
Executive: Isme deal nahi kar rahe ho na, to ye product aapko delete karna hai.
Customer: Kar lunga mai, kar lunga.
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Waise mere ko isme koi interest bhi nahi aa raha hai ab kuch bhi kaho. Kyuki mai thak chuka hu inse baat kar karke sabhi se. Kya? Ek ek ek ek buyer se agar apan ek ek ek ek buyer se apan baat karte hai, discuss karte hai aur uske baad usko pura samjhate hai, catalog.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aur unse baat karke unko bilkul detail bhi share kar dete hai. Sir ji hone ke baad.
Executive: Aap IndiaMART ka kaafi achi service use kar rahe hai, TrustSeal use kar rahe hai, theek hai? Aur aapka renewal bhi aayega, aane wala hai sir. To mai aapko ye bata rahi hu sir. Ki service to aapki achi use kar rahe ho. But aap kis tarike se aap apne buyer ka follow karte ho sir, kis tarike se baat karte ho. Theek hai? To wo aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Conversion nahi ho raha kya sir?
Customer: Accha madam bura to nahi manoge?
Executive: Nahi, bataiye.
Customer: Aapki waha pe kya tankha hai? Aapki salary kitni hai waha pe?
Executive: Sir, mai aapko sorry bolna chahungi, ye sab cheeze discuss nahi ki jaati sir, salary wagera ka.
Customer: Aap batao jara, hum samay de rahe hai, sab kuch hai, uske bawajud aap mujhe bata rahe ho ki kaise kya. Kaun vyakti agar apna customer ko chhodna chahega, batao?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Nahi dekho sir, wo to mujhe bhi pata hai ki aap samay de rahe ho, proper IndiaMART pe de rahe ho. But aap na IndiaMART ke buyer ka call nahi utha rahe to maine wo aapko batane ke liye call kara hai sir. Ki aapki call missed ho rahi hai, theek hai? Aur aapki jo mapping hai usme se maine aapko pucha tha ki matlab iska aap deal karte ho ya nahi karte. To aapne jaise mujhe bola ki ha mai delete kar deti hu.
Customer: Rice ka kar do delete, kar do rice ka delete.
Executive: Theek hai, wo mai kar dungi delete, theek hai sir? Aur dekhiye sir, aapko matlab kya pareshani aa rahi hai, matlab koi conversion nahi aa raha hai, kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Aap jo customer dete ho na, wo ek hi customer ko buylead sabhi ko de dete ho, baat ye hai.
Executive: Sabhi ko nahi dete sir, paanch logo ko dete hai sir. Sir buyer actually mujhe ye bataiye sir aapko pata hai local me, aapko pata hai shop se do do do do teen teen kilometer ka distance hai aur agar aisa karenge to fir kya matlab aayega? Wo bhi open karega, mai bhi open karunga, kya hai mujhe, customer ko kaise handle karenge?
Executive: Sir, mai aapko ek baat bata deti hu, ek baat bata deti hu sir, agar hum aapko denge, theek hai? Aapke paas buylead jayegi, aap us buylead ko kab aap us buylead ko purchase karoge sir? Wo buylead sir aapke intezar me thodi na rahegi, usko to turant response chahiye na sir. Hai na? To isliye hum paanch logo ko karte hai jo sabse jyada active rahega aur attentive rahega to wo jaldi se jaldi. Aap khud hi, aap khud hi dekhiye na, data kab band hai? Data to 24 ghanta on rehta hai, kaunsa band pada hai, batao?
Executive: Sir, meri baat suniye sir, aapke phone me bhi to internet rehta hai sir. Internet aani bhi to chahiye aapko.
Customer: Lag raha sir.
Customer: Jab on rehta hai, jab buylead aayegi tab khud dekh ke hum unse baat karenge, theek hai? Sir aap mujhe ye bataiye jitni bhi problem aati hai sir logo ka tha aapka sab cheeze tha catalog ka tha, maine sari cheeze aapki theek kari hai sir. To IndiaMART jo hai aapke sath kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir awaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Sir ke dwara hold pe rakhne ka karan yaha se call ko disconnect ki ja rahi hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is missing buylead calls.

- Customer is not getting proper response.

- Customer states same buylead is shared with everyone.

- Customer mapping is not correct.

- Customer is not getting conversion.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about missed calls.

- Executive asked about the issues customer is facing.

- Executive offered to delete rice distoner.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will delete rice distoner.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, mapping, missed calls
